{{cpp/keyword/title|{{tt|continue}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/continue|{{tt|continue}} statement]]: as the declaration of the statement

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

[[nodiscard]] constexpr auto get_digits(const std::string&amp; string) noexcept
{
    std::string digits{};

    for (const auto&amp; character: string)
    {
        if (character &lt; '0' {{!!}} character &gt; '9') [[likely]]
            continue; // conditionally skips the following statement
        digits += character;
    }
    
    return digits;
}

int main() noexcept
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; get_digits("H3LL0, W0RLD!");
}
|output=
300
}}
